successes.title: Boss Fight Studio's Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Action Figures
successes.description: Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. is a line of highly articulated action figures for adult collectors designed with play and customization in mind.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU  We appreciate your show of support for Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S.
PRINT Backers at this level receive a limited edition art print created by the fabulous Adam Riches, featuring characters from the Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology figure assortments.
T-SHIRT -  Backers at this level receive a Boss Fight Studio t-shirt. Please specify size when ordering.
STONE SPARTAN FIGURE Backers at this level receive the Spartan action figure with stone deco.
CORAL SNAKE GORGON FIGURE Backers at this level will receive the Gorgon action figure with coral snake deco.
SPARTAN FIGURE Backers at this level receive the Spartan action figure in standard deco colors.
MEDUSA FIGURE Backers at this level will receive the Medusa figure.

BRONZE FIGURE AND PRINT - Backers at this level will receive the Spartan action figure in the bronze deco. This is a special deco that will not be offered with the regular retail figures. The Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology art print is also included.

SPARTAN FIGURE, GORGON CORAL SNAKE FIGURE AND PRINT - Backers at this level will receive the Spartan action figure and the Gorgon Coral Snake action figure.  The Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology art print is also included.

MEDUSA FIGURE, STONE SPARTAN FIGURE AND PRINT - Backers at this level will receive the Spartan action figure and the Gorgon Coral Snake action figure.  The Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology art print is also included.

CELESTIAL TWO-PACK AND PRINT - Backers at the level will receive a two-pack of a Spartan and a Gorgon in the celestial deco. This is a special deco that will not be offered with the regular retail figures. The Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology art print is also included.

WAVE 1 SET OF FOUR FIGURES - Backers at this level receive all four of the retail deco figures, Spartan, Medusa, Coral Snake Gorgon, Stone Spartan, plus the Boss Fight Studio t-shirt and the Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology print.

BLANK BODY CUSTOMIZER SET - Backers at this level will receive a set of six H.A.C.K.S. Blank Body figures: two Shadow Gray Males, two Champagne Beige Females, one Translucent Fire Orange male, and one Python Purple female.
STONE SPARTAN ARMY, Backers at this level will receive ONE ARMY of 10 Stone Spartan figures, polybagged, the Boss Fight Studio t-shirt and the Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology print.
CORAL SNAKE GORGON ARMY, Backers at this level will receive ONE ARMY of 10 Coral Snake Gorgon figures, polybagged, the Boss Fight Studio t-shirt and the Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology print.
SPARTAN ARMY, Backers at this level will receive ONE ARMY of 10 Spartan figures, polybagged, the Boss Fight Studio t-shirt and the Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology print.

WAVE 1 AND EXCLUSIVES - Backers at this level will receive one of each retail figures plus the Bronze Spartan and Celestial 2-pack of Figures, plus the Boss Fight t-shirt and the Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology print.

ALL IN - Backers of this level will receive one of EVERY item available when the Kickstarter is over, including all unlocked Stretch Goal items, Boss Fight Studio T-shirt, and the Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology print.

COMPLETE ARMY BATTLE PACK - Backers at this level will receive ONE ARMY of 10 Spartans, ONE ARMY of 10 Stone Spartans, and ONE ARMY of 10 Coral Gorgons, plus the Boss Fight T-shirt and the Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology art print.

COMPLETE ARMY BATTLE PACK WITH EXCLUSIVES - Backers at this level will receive ONE ARMY of 10 Spartans, ONE ARMY of 10 Stone Spartans, and ONE ARMY of 10 Coral Gorgons, plus 1 Medusa figure, 1 Bronze Spartan and the Celestial 2-pack, the Boss Fight T-shirt and the Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology art print.

CUSTOM HEADSCULPT - Backers at this level will receive a Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. head in their likeness, sculpted by one of the Boss Fight Studios sculptors. The head will be compatible will similarly scaled Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. figures, so you can put it on any of the Greek warrior or Gorgon bodies. You provide the photo reference, and our sculptors will take it from there.
H.A.C.K.S. MALE RESIN HARD COPY - One lucky backer receives a resin hard copy of the H.A.C.K.S. basic male figure.
H.A.C.K.S. FEMALE RESIN HARD COPY - One lucky backer receives a resin hard copy of the H.A.C.K.S. basic female figure.
SPARTAN RESIN HARD COPY - One lucky backer receives a resin hard copy of the Spartan figure.
MEDUSA RESIN HARD COPY - One lucky backer receives a resin hard copy of the Medusa figure.

SPARTA! - Backers of this level will receive their COMPLETE SPARTAN ARMY of 300 figures, perfect for the advanced diorama-builder, polybagged, plus Boss Fight T-shirt and Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. Greek Mythology Print

LIKENESS ON A PRODUCTION FIGURE - Two very lucky supporters will receive his or her likeness on a full production figure in a future assortment of Vitruvian H.A.C.K.S. figures. That means an entire run of retail figures with your very own face. You'll also receive a copy of the figure when it's finished. By selecting this incentive, bidder agrees to sign all necessary forms regarding the use of his or her likeness and provide photo reference.
